verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: it wo n't take long for him to tell if North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is serious about denuclearization] .
President Trump said it [V: wo] n't take long for him to tell if North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is serious about denuclearization .
President Trump said it [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: take] [ARG1: long] [ARG0: for him to tell if North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is serious about denuclearization] .
President Trump said it wo n't take long for [ARG0: him] to [V: tell] [ARG1: if North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is serious about denuclearization] .
President Trump said it wo n't take long for him to tell if [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: is] [ARG2: serious about denuclearization] .
